scripts.pack: [ ! -d dist ] && mkdir dist || /bin/echo -n; mv public onprem && tar czpf dist/docs-onprem.tgz userguide && mv onprem public && ls -l dist/onprem.tgz
scripts.deploy-to-preview: npm run cibuild && rsync -a --delete public/ web@tc:/cs/local/guide/onprem
scripts.deploy-to-s3: aws --quiet s3 sync public/ s3://docs.codestream.com/onprem/ --delete && npm run cfdirty
